text: You would think the last thing Kourtney Kardashian needs right now is more guy drama â€” but that didn't stop the pregnant reality star from stepping out with her former flame Justin Bieber! MORE : Kim Kardashian Details Robbery in New Police Statement The two were spotted at The Peppermint Club in Hollywood while LD accompanied Kourt's sister Kim Kardashian, 36, on her trip to Dubai, where things allegedly went south thanks to Scott's antics.
